name: Warriors' Wrath
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 (64 bit only) Processor: Intel duo cores or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1400 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I spent a long time configuring and exporting a controller setting for this game. I did not enjoy ten consecutive minutes of this game. The controls are lame. The content (enemies, quests, skills) are unoriginal. Could not refund the game because I fell asleep playing it in the middle of the day.   I will say however, If somehow this game were vamped up and polished it could be a fun unique mmorpg of some type. Not worth what I spent is my general consensus/feeling.
Really interesting game play, cute grafics, nice characters. I with there was 4 player co-op and more maps.
It is not really bad (especially for the price i got it in a bundle) but sometimes feels like an Early Access title that needs quite some polishing.
